name: Absorbing Prism
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Electro Hypostasis, heal that character for 3 HP and attach the Electro Crystal Core to them.
(You must have Electro Hypostasis in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1]:</color> When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2401]</color>, heal that character for 3 HP and attach the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124014]</color> to them.\n(You must have $[A2401] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>:</color> When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Hypostasis</color>, heal that character for 3 HP and attach the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Crystal Core</color> to them.\n(You must have Electro Hypostasis in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext:
"Here's our chance!"
"Hey, it's on our side!"
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Electro Hypostasis at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas
